source_text: Men uyda o‘tiribman.
expected: I am sitting at home.

source_text: Bu mening kitobim.
expected: This is my book.

source_text: U maktabga ketdi.
expected: He went to school.

source_text: Men choy ichmoqchiman.
expected: I want to drink tea.

source_text: U juda yaxshi inson.
expected: He is a very good person.

source_text: Havo bugun issiq.
expected: The weather is hot today.

source_text: Mening ismim Aziz.
expected: My name is Aziz.

source_text: Bu uy juda katta.
expected: This house is very big.

source_text: Men televizor ko‘ryapman.
expected: I am watching TV.

source_text: U mashina haydayapti.
expected: He is driving a car.

source_text: Men har kuni ertalab sport bilan shug‘ullanaman.
expected: I exercise every morning.

source_text: Kecha biz do‘stlar bilan parkda sayr qildik.
expected: Yesterday we walked in the park with friends.

source_text: U yangi telefon sotib oldi va juda xursand bo‘ldi.
expected: He bought a new phone and was very happy.

source_text: Men ingliz tilini o‘rganishni davom ettiryapman.
expected: I am continuing to learn English.

source_text: Biz yozda tog‘larga sayohat qilishni rejalashtiryapmiz.
expected: We are planning to travel to the mountains in summer.

source_text: U o‘zining yangi ishini juda yaxshi ko‘radi.
expected: She really likes her new job.

source_text: Men kitob o‘qishdan zavq olaman.
expected: I enjoy reading books.

source_text: Kechasi yomg‘ir yog‘ib, havo salqinlashdi.
expected: It rained at night and the weather cooled down.

source_text: U universitetda informatika bo‘yicha o‘qiyapti.
expected: He is studying computer science at the university.

source_text: Biz oilamiz bilan hafta oxiri kinoga bordik.
expected: We went to the cinema with our family on the weekend.

source_text: U o‘z maqsadiga erishish uchun qat’iyat bilan ishladi.
expected: He worked with determination to achieve his goal.

source_text: Hayotda eng katta boylik — sog‘liqdir.
expected: The greatest wealth in life is health.

source_text: U juda dono inson bo‘lib, har doim to‘g‘ri maslahat beradi.
expected: He is a very wise person and always gives good advice.

source_text: Qiyin vaziyatlarda ham umidni yo‘qotmaslik kerak.
expected: One should not lose hope even in difficult situations.

source_text: Yaxshi do‘st — qiyinchilikda bilinadi.
expected: A good friend is known in hardship.

source_text: U uzoq o‘ylab, nihoyat to‘g‘ri qarorga keldi.
expected: He thought for a long time and finally made the right decision.

source_text: Har bir insonning hayotida o‘ziga xos sinovlar bo‘ladi.
expected: Every person has unique challenges in life.

source_text: U mehnatkashligi va halolligi bilan boshqalardan ajralib turadi.
expected: He stands out from others with his diligence and honesty.

source_text: Inson hayoti davomida bilim izlashdan to‘xtamasligi lozim.
expected: A person should never stop seeking knowledge throughout life.

source_text: Har qanday muvaffaqiyat sabr-toqat va mehnat bilan keladi.
expected: Any success comes with patience and hard work.

source_text: Dasturiy ta’minotning yangi versiyasi xavfsizlik protokollarini yangiladi.
expected: The new version of the software updated its security protocols.

source_text: Serverning ishlash tezligini optimallashtirish uchun kechiktirish vaqtini qisqartirish kerak.
expected: To optimize server performance, the latency must be reduced.

source_text: Ma’lumotlar bazasi indekslash orqali so‘rovlarni tezroq qayta ishlaydi.
expected: The database processes queries faster through indexing.

source_text: Sun’iy intellekt modeli katta hajmdagi ma’lumotlar ustida o‘qitildi.
expected: The artificial intelligence model was trained on large-scale data.

source_text: Sensorlar real vaqt rejimida harorat va namlikni o‘lchaydi.
expected: Sensors measure temperature and humidity in real time.

source_text: Algoritm murakkab hisob-kitoblarni millisekundlarda bajaradi.
expected: The algorithm performs complex calculations in milliseconds.

source_text: Tizimdagi xatoliklar jurnal faylida avtomatik ravishda qayd etiladi.
expected: Errors in the system are automatically recorded in the log file.

source_text: Kiberxavfsizlik siyosati foydalanuvchi ma’lumotlarini himoya qilishga qaratilgan.
expected: The cybersecurity policy aims to protect user data.

source_text: Sensor tarmog‘i uzluksiz monitoring orqali energiya sarfini kamaytiradi.
expected: The sensor network reduces energy consumption through continuous monitoring.

source_text: Bulutli xizmatlar foydalanuvchilarga moslashuvchan saqlash hajmini taqdim etadi.
expected: Cloud services provide users with flexible storage capacity.

source_text: Kecha jigarim bilan ko‘rishtim. Mazza qilib shashlik-xo‘rlik qildik.
expected: Yesterday I met up with my bro. We ate shashlik.

source_text: Ukam futbol o‘ynashni qotirib qo‘yadi. Tepsa koptok osmonga uchib ketadi.
expected: My little bro can’t play football good. When he kicks, the ball flies into the sky.

source_text: Nima gapla bolla? Qale ishla?
expected: What’s up, guys? How are you?

source_text: Kecha o‘rtog‘im adasiga rossa paxta qo‘ydi. Yengi telefon kerak shakil.
expected: Yesterday my friend really buttered up his dad. Guess he wants a new phone.

source_text: Bugun jonkam bilan ko‘rishkanimda rossa miyyami yedi. Oxiri nervimga teygani uchun, shapat berdim.
expected: When I met my babe today, she really got on my nerves. In the end, I slapped her.

source_text: Eee, manga baribir. Man sirpandim bu yerdan.
expected: Eh, I don’t care. I’m outta here.

source_text: U bolani soqqasi ko‘p, lyuboy moshinani sotib oladi.
expected: That guy’s loaded, he can buy any car he wants.

source_text: Anu qizchani ko‘rinishi takoy ekan mi?
expected: That girl looks attractive, doesn’t she?

source_text: Kecha moshinamga zo‘r saka diska oldim.
expected: Yesterday I got some awesome alloy rims for my car.

source_text: Moshinani shapkasi qancha?
expected: How much is the grease money for the car?
